title: Your Share of the $725M Facebook Settlement Will Be Tiny
description: If you used Facebook in the U.S. between 2007 and 2022, you can get a cut of the settlement of the suit accusing the social-media company of allowing third parties to access private information.

title: What Does Your iPhone Color Say About You? Red Is for Attention-Seekers and 5 More Insights from a Color Theorist
description: We use our phones to communicate almost everything but pay little heed to what their pigment broadcasts about us. Here, a psychologist weighs in on our choices.

title: Apple's Tim Cook Meets India Prime Minister Modi, in Move to Diversify Supply Chain
description: Apple chief executive met with India’s Narendra Modi, visiting the country where the iPhone maker wants to expand its manufacturing footprint and smartphone sales.

title: The iPhone Setting Thieves Use to Lock You Out of Your Apple Account
description: The recovery key was designed to make Apple IDs safer. Instead, these victims permanently lost family photos and other precious digital possessions.

title: TSMC Seeks Up to $15 Billion From U.S. for Chip Plants but Objects to Conditions
description: The world’s biggest contract chip maker is pushing back on some of the conditions Washington has attached to chip-factory subsidies as it looks for up to $15 billion in government money.
